corda / net.corda.core.contracts / Fix

Fix

data class Fix : CommandData

A Fix represents a named interest rate, on a given day, for a given duration. It can be embedded in a tx.

Constructors

<init> Fix(of: FixOf, value: BigDecimal)

A Fix represents a named interest rate, on a given day, for a given duration. It can be embedded in a tx.
